column2: geom_point(aes(x = x_nodos, y = y_nodos, color = "Valores"), size = 3) +
geom_point(aes(x = x_nodos, y = der_nodos, color = "Valores"), size = 3) +
mispline <- cubicspline(x_nodos, y_nodos, endp2nd = TRUE, der = c(df(x_0), df(x_n)))
kar_derivada <- function(x) (mispline_f(x + h) - mispline_f(x - h)) / (2 * h)
geom_function(aes(color = paste("S(x)", n)), fun = mispline_f, linewidth = 0.75) +
geom_function(aes(color = paste("S'(x)", n)), fun = kar_derivada, linewidth = 0.75) +
